A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a well made movie that had beautiful visuals and good moments.  Unfortunately\, the direction that they have taken I completely disagree with.  It's as though all the things that JJ Abrams had set up Rian Johnson just ignored\, and feels like a slap in the face.  I've been waiting for 25 years to see Luke Skywalker's true potential and I get to see him drink titty milk and fade away.  Despite a well-crafted movie\, I can't get over the fact that we were provided a bunch of non-answers to so many things.  Last Jedi set up the mystery around Snoke and who Rey's parents were only to have Last Jedi completely disregard these elements.  I respect the bold direction that they are going\, I just think it's the wrong direction.
